Text.Page:
Before you go...just one more thing. I have a tuwangi contact here. I'm sure he's fine, but...

Maybe you could find {@LinkCreature:205#1016#Jirra} for me and make sure he's all right?

Oh, and if he's in trouble, give him this scroll. He can use it to teleport somewhere safe.

Help! Help help! Oh, but creature cannot understand.

Or...oh, it can! It can understand! Help me!

Oh, what's this? A teleport scroll? Oh, yes! Thank you, thank you!

Go see my brother, {@LinkCreature:205#1003#Pangari}. He is southeast of here. Let him know I'm safe!

Thank you for helping Jirra escape! Things here have gotten much worseâ€”three tribes, all fighting to expand the swamp, but fighting each other!

Tuwangis fighting tuwangis is not right. Not right at all. No one can trust anyone else! I had to run but my brother was left behind.

I'm so grateful you got him out. Thank you.
